long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📂 Organize Your ChatGPT Conversations with Ease!

Easily manage and categorize your ChatGPT conversations with our plugin. Create folders, add subfolders, and assign tags to keep track of your most important chats. Perfect for users who need a simple way to sort and find past conversations—whether for work, study, or personal projects. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and enjoy a new level of productivity with an organized ChatGPT workspace! ✨

How to Use:

Open your ChatGPT history 🕒
Select "New Folder" 🗂 to create a folder and name it 📛
Add subfolders 📂 and tag each chat 🏷 for easy finding
Find your chats quickly and keep your workspace clutter-free! 🚀
